content.rendered:
Donors Recognition Wall

Major Gifts & Planned Giving, GEOKC Endowment Fund and the most-highest giving of GEOKC Capital Campaign Donation give a significant and golden opportunity to all those prospects who are qualified to display their names permanently in GEOKC Donor Recognition Wall to remember. Beside the Permanent Honor Opportunity the Permanent Naming Opportunity include the names plates, decorated separately and in an architecture manner to display on the top of recognition wall. This is the most brightest and attractive spot of GEOKC Facilities and impressed all participants of GEOKC Deeply.

To get the chance of these golden giving opportunities, please click the following links to proceed:

Donor Recognition Programs

Beside the Permanent Honor Opportunity the Permanent Naming Opportunity include the names plates, decorated […]
